pilots.name: "Deathrain"
pilots.caption: Dexterous Bombardier
pilots.ability: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform an action

pilots.name: Cutlass Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The TIE punisher's design builds upon the success of the TIE bomber, adding shielding, a second bomb chute and three additional ordinance pods, each equipped with a twin ion engine.
